resp = client.indices.create(
    index="my-index-000001",
    mappings={
        "enabled": False
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="my-index-000001",
    id="1",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "user_id": "kimchy",
        "session_data": {
            "object": {
                "some_field": "some_value"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.search(
    index="my-index-000001",
    fields=[
        "user_id",
        {
            "field": "session_data.object.*",
            "include_unmapped": True
        }
    ],
    source=False,
)
print(resp2)
